course_name: Capstone Research Project for GDEN Students
description: Production and defense of a research plan that demonstrates significant understanding of a topic in geriatric dentistry.

sections.instructor: Roseann Mulligan,Lisa Hou,Mehdi Mohammadi,Reyes Enciso,Glenn Clark

description: Common geriatric dentistry topics including epidemiology of oral diseases, common dental diseases, their management and prevention protocols for older adult patients. Open only to Master and Professional Dental students.

sections.instructor: Lisa Hou,Roseann Mulligan,Anette Vistoso Monreal,Glenn Clark

course_name: Internal Medicine and Systemic Disease for Dental Residents
description: Seminars on common systemic diseases and the potential interactions with oral disease and treatment

sections.instructor: Mehdi Mohammadi,Anette Vistoso Monreal,Roseann Mulligan,Glenn Clark

course_name: Epidemiology, Nutrition and Aging for Dental Residents
description: Seminars on the various mucosal, cutaneous, gingival and salivary diseases and lesions in the oral and maxillofacial region.

course_name: OFPM Case Portfolio Preparation for Dental Residents
description: Examination of clinical cases of geriatric patients with orofacial pain and oral lesions through online conferences in preparation, development and defense of portfolio of multiple cases.

course_name: GDEN Case Portfolio Preparation for Dental Residents
description: Examination of clinical cases of geriatric patients with complex medical conditions through online conferences in preparation, development and defense of portfolio of multiple cases.

sections.instructor: Roseann Mulligan,Piedad Suarez,Nazanin Sharifi,Lisa Hou,Mehdi Mohammadi,Anette Vistoso Monreal,Glenn Clark

description: A coordinated approach to understanding, critically assessing and applying the principles of scientific inquiry through the study of clinically relevant, discipline specific literature.
